data.current_description: Searches Knowledge Graph for entities that match the constraints. A list of matched entities will be returned in response, which will be in JSON-LD format and compatible with http://schema.org
data.summary_suggestion: Search Knowledge Graph for matching entities
data.description_suggestion: Searches the Google Knowledge Graph for entities matching specified constraints. Accepts search parameters to filter results by query, language, types, and other criteria. Returns a SearchResponse containing a list of matched entities in JSON-LD format compatible with schema.org. Each entity includes detailed information such as name, description, types, and related metadata.
